name: Create Interaction Response
description:
Create a response to an Interaction from the gateway. Takes an interaction response.
This endpoint also supports file attachments similar to the webhook endpoints. Refer to Uploading Files for details on uploading files and multipart/form-data requests.

name: Get Original Interaction Response
description: Returns the initial Interaction response. Functions the same as Get Webhook Message.

name: Edit Original Interaction Response
description: Edits the initial Interaction response. Functions the same as Edit Webhook Message.

name: Delete Original Interaction Response
description: Deletes the initial Interaction response. Returns 204 No Content on success.

name: Create Followup Message
description: Create a followup message for an Interaction. Functions the same as Execute Webhook, but wait is always true, and flags can be set to 64 in the body to send an ephemeral message. The thread_id, avatar_url, and username parameters are not supported when using this endpoint for interaction followups.

name: Get Followup Message
description: Returns a followup message for an Interaction. Functions the same as Get Webhook Message. Does not support ephemeral followups.

name: Edit Followup Message
description: Edits a followup message for an Interaction. Functions the same as Edit Webhook Message. Does not support ephemeral followups.

name: Delete Followup Message
description: Deletes a followup message for an Interaction. Returns 204 No Content on success. Does not support ephemeral followups.
